title: Prepare Final Return for a Deceased Taxpayer
description: The executor of an estate needs to file the final Form 1040 for a person who passed away during the year.

tasks.description: Gather all income documents for the decedent for the period they were alive.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary income information.

tasks.description: Prepare the final Form 1040, indicating that the taxpayer is deceased.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly prepares the return and marks it as final.

tasks.description: If a refund is due, prepare Form 1310, Statement of Person Claiming Refund Due a Deceased Taxpayer, to be filed with the return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares the necessary form for the executor to claim the refund.
